cause.description:
(DO NOT DONATE) (DO NOT DONATE) (DO NOT DONATE)
(NAU) to integrate the countries of Canada, The United States, and Mexico into a single economic, monetary and political union, patterned and introducing the same policies as the European Union, and imposing a Monetary policy whereby all nations use The "Amero"" as thier currency. This is being accomplished without congressional consent, or parliamentary debate, without imput from the citizens of either country, and under secretive and disguised means. (The SPP).
This Union would be the second step towards the Eliteist Vision of a One World Government.
1. Stop The North American Union Through education
2. Protect Canada's Sovereignty
3. Stop the movement towards One World Governance
4. Pressure Mainstream Media to cover this issue.
cause.mission: Inform the Citizens of Canada, The US, And Mexico Of the North American Union
cause.name: Say No to North American Union
